title: Final Impact: A Post-Apocalyptic Survival Thriller
features: Mankind has suffered five mass extinctions, the sixth will be our final.Days away from a catastrophic event that will end the world, five strangers find themselves stranded in the suicide capital of America dealing with the difficulties, regrets, and choices in their lives while trying to survive. Among the group is a talented performer, a petty thief, a gambler, a lady of the night and a hard working cab driver. With the clock ticking down, and a sliver of hope found in a text message, their only hope is to get out of the city and embark on a dangerous journey across the country together.Final Impact is a story of survival, friendship, and redemption in the face of impending doom.
description: Jack Hunt is a bestselling author of horror, sci-fi and post-apocalyptic novels. Jack lives on the East coast of North America. jhuntauthor@gmail.com Sign up for his newsletter and visit him at his site here http: //jackhuntbooks.com
